dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: As you might have seen earlier... that's Marile. In fact, I met him once at a job interview for B Corp. once.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Really? Samjo... You applied for B Corp, too?

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: ...Of course, K Corp. was my primary choice... A man of mediocrity like me has to send an application to every Wing in hopes that one will accept it.
There were corpses around Marile... "Appalling" couldn't begin to describe their state.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Oh dear, pardon me, I need to use the restroom...
Samjo turned pale and ran, covering his mouth with a hand.

dataList.title: K Corp. Dept. of Food Resource Development
dataList.content: Our researchers... couldn't have been able to fight back at all.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: K Corp's employees didn't seem to have a problem with bludgeoning my colleagues who didn't so much as swing a fist, either.
We're looking for your boss. Where is she?

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: What I want to know is how you're still alive.
Oh, you mean those galling murder machines? They weren't anything we couldn't deal with. The bomb... did hurt a bit, though.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: No. That bomb wasn't meant for annihilation. It was a means.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: There's been an unexpected variable to Ran and Shrenne's plan. What are you?
Faust broke her silence.
Even if you were to return to an age without technology, you won't find the peace you seek.
Once accustomed to the luxury brought by technology, people won't be able to withstand life in the past. Think of the time when trips to the Backstreets were trending among the rich.
They only use the experience to take another look at their own lives and be thankful for everything they have. Hardly any would live in a less opulent era given the opportunity.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: ...And? I don't like talkative people. Not fond of explaining things to you, either.
I'm not the talkative sort. And I don't require explanations in any field. I was simply curious to know the difference in perspectives.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: ...None of us take WARP trains.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: We don't eat the meat the City has to offer, either.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: When you know the truth, you wouldn't even consider something as shallow as Backstreets trips.
Hm... The elders in my family, who must know even greater things than I do, didn't have any problem using them though?

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: The masses are ignorant. They won't believe it even if you show it before their eyes.
And this is your conclusion?
Get rid of everything and make 'em live in that empty world?

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: You wouldn't get—
No, I think I get it just fine.
There are plenty of blighters out there who just don't get it if you talk nicely.
They'd only start empathizing with the likes of me after they get a couple bruises and scars on their faces.
It gives me the urge to just wreck it all.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: If we ever recruit new members...

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: I'll try excluding the educational background from the requisites.
Although Heathcliff has never told us about what schools he went to... I can see where it's coming from.
Still, you're going way over the line.
